alert.note: Alert for Jackson (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 02 at 8:54AM EDT until August 02 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of central West Virginia, including the following county, Jackson. * WHEN...Until 245 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 853 AM EDT, Emergency management reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ripley, Kenna, Given, Fairplain, Evans, Statts Mills and Cottageville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
